name: Department Sales
query: select charge_type as "Type:Data:500", modified as "Date:Date:200", COALESCE(sum(base_rounded_total),0) as "Total Amount:int:400" from `tabSales Invoice` where  modified >= %(from_date)s and modified <= %(to_date)s  and charge_type is not null and charge_type <> '' group by charge_type having sum(base_rounded_total)>0;
